Posts.Content: Final Gleason 3+5=8-I've heard better news-Stage T2C-Positive Margin in Bladder Neck-PSA after 2 mos. = 0.01-done by VA-don't know if that meant < or not. Will get rechecked by another lab. Am 70 yrs old. Surgeon suggested radiation at 6 mos. Am improving with incontinence, anyway. What is the consensus out there regarding success of radiation in similar cases, if someone would please share their experience or offer advice on prognosis. There was no number associated with the Positive Margin that I can see on the report. Thanks very much and good luck to all.
Posts.Title: Robotic Surgery by experienced surgeon
